title: I’m Weak to Things Like That!
detail_text: <:th_ch0004/>Do you really want to go mountain climbing? I’d welcome you with open arms, but.... it’s quite tough, you know?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0109/>Yeah. Ruby wants to try to build up my strength more. Ruby saw that mountain climbing increases endurance, leg strength, and balance, so Ruby wanted to try it....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0004/>Yes, you’re right. If you challenge yourself to climb to someplace high up, you can train your lung capacity as well<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0109/>Train my lung capacity....? Something like making me able to sing louder....?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0004/>That’s right! I have a mountain I recommend, so let’s try challenging that one first. To prepare before we go mountain climbing, should we take a walk by the riverside cycling path?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0109/>Sure! I will be in your care!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0109/>Haah, Haah.... Hauu~.... Umi-san, Ruby is a bit tired.... Ruby needs to drink some juice....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0004/>W-, we’re not even halfway to the goal, you know<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0109/>Please.... Umi-san....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0004/>P-, please don’t look at me with those eyes! I’m weak to things like that.... Are you and Kotori both using some kind of manipulating magic on me!?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
